name: Balsamic Panna Cotta
keywords: balsamic vinegar, citric acid, heavy cream, dessert, gluten-free, nut-free
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon citric acid (sold in health food stores).

recipeInstructions.text: Stir together all the ingredients in a heavy-bottomed pot and bring to a simmer over medium heat (it will immediately thicken and then thin out).
Divide mixture among 10 four-ounce ramekins. Cool, then cover tightly with plastic wrap and chill for at least 1 hour or until ready to serve, up to 3 days.
